message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer you the product for $105, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit away from my target. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll meet you at $102, but that's as low as I can go.
